Hello CMS React devs,

We are releasing two new components today, `RichText` & `Cta`, available with the latest version of `cms-components` that integrate with the RichText/CTA fields.

RichText be imported via `import { RichText } from '@HubSpot/cms-components'`

Example Usage:
`<RichText fieldPath="my_richtext_field" />`

Cta be imported via `import { Cta } from '@HubSpot/cms-components'`

Example Usage:
`<Cta fieldPath="<http://group_field.my|group_field.my>_cta_field" />`


These components will render the field's values rendered content, i.e. the HTML output of the HubL tags `{% richtext %}` , and `{% cta %}` ) into the DOM.


Please see associated <https://github.HubSpot.com/cms-react/reference/cms-components.html#richtext|documentation> for more information.

Thanks!
